reuters.title: MEDIA GENERAL SAYS GIANT GROUP, AFFILIATES HAVE 9.8 PCT OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK
reuters.body: Shr 18 cts vs 14 cts Net 1,852,000 vs 1,488,000 Revs 44.7 mln vs 35.9 mln Nine mths Shr 41 cts vs 34 cts Net 4,233,000 vs 3,512,000 Revs 123.8 mln vs 98.4 mln NOTE: Full Name is American Management Systems Inc. Reuter 
